QuestData.Title: True Survivors
QuestData.Description:
I know we're pretty banged up, we can't forget why we're here. Our people are counting on us, and I don't plan on letting them down. We've got to find a temporary place for ourselves in these savage parts, and I know just the place.
Now quit whining and MOVE IT.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and speak with Old Grimtusk at the Frozen Lake in the Azure Span.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find and speak with Old Grimtusk at the Frozen Lake in the Azure Span.
QuestData.RewardText: That wasn't so hard, was it?
